SESSION TITLE: Test, Optimize and Personalize Experiences with Adobe Target
SESSION ABSTRACT:
Please bring your own device to participate in the hands-on demonstrations during this session. 

 

This one-day session provides key features needed to tailor and personalize your customers’ experiences.  You'll discover how offers perform across customer journeys, personalize more deeply by blending Target audiences with other Adobe Experience Cloud audiences, and increase the value of your activities by joining together profile data from different sources on the fly to enable real-time personalization.  

 

This course will help prepare you for the Adobe Target Optimization Specialist Professional certification exam and the Adobe Target Business Practitioner Professional certification exam.
CFP: AUDIENCE TYPE: Campaign Marketer,Digital Marketer,Marketer,Martech Professional,Operations Marketer ,Product Manager,Project Manager,UI/UX Designer
